title: Addendum to: Mahler's method in several variables and finite automata
authors: Colin Faverjon (ICJ, CNRS), Boris Adamczewski (ICJ, CNRS)
abstract:
This note is an addendum to the paper ''Mahler's method in several variables
and finite automata''. It strengthens part (i) of Theorem 1.1 of the
aforementioned paper.
